It's a critically acclaimed film starring Tom Hanks, set in 1930s Illinois, where a mob enforcer and his son go on the run after witnessing a murder. The stunning cinematography and powerful performances will transport you on an emotional journey.

If you'd like an alternative, "Runaway Bride" is another great option that explores the theme of what people say versus what they do. With Julia Roberts in the lead, this romantic comedy is full of humor and heart.

Or, if you're in the mood for something a bit more unconventional, "Alex in Wonderland" might be up your alley! This 1973 film is a fascinating blend of fantasy and reality, as Alex Morrison navigates his own creative struggles while exploring the boundaries between art and life. With its unique tone and eclectic cast, this one's sure to leave you pondering the power of imagination.
